spell_tooltip.description: Reduces the cooldown of Dancing Rune Weapon by 50% and its duration by 25%.
All enemies within 8 yards slowly decay, losing up to 3% of their max health every 2 sec. Max 5 stacks. Lasts 6 sec.
Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Focuses dark power into a strike that deals 350,555 Physical damage and heals you for 30.19% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 8.5% of maximum health.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side.  You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time. Lasts 1 min.
Auto attacks have a chance to generate 3 Runic Power.
Death Strike's cost is reduced by 5, and its healing is increased by 5%.

Heart Strike hits up to 3 additional enemies while you remain in Death and Decay. 

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.
Smash the target's mind with cold, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.

Targets in a cone in front of you are blinded, causing them to wander disoriented for 5 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

When Blinding Sleet ends, enemies are slowed by 50% for 6 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Anti-Magic Shell by 20 sec and increases its duration and amount absorbed by 40%.
Gain 5% Haste while you remain within your Death and Decay.
Your auto attack damage grants you an absorb shield equal to 40% of the damage dealt.
Stamina increased by 20%.
Your diseases have a chance to weaken your enemy causing your attacks against them to deal 6% increased damage for 5 sec.
Your Runic Power spending abilities increase your melee attack speed by 6% for 10 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Places an Anti-Magic Zone that reduces spell damage taken by party or raid members by 20%. The Anti-Magic Zone lasts for 8 sec or until it absorbs 25.1 million damage.
Increases the effectiveness of your Runeforge effects by 20%.
Absorbs are 15% more effective on you.
Death and Decay reduces the movement speed of enemies within its area by 90%, decaying by 10% every sec.

Strike an enemy for 144,080 Shadowfrost damage and afflict the enemy with Soul Reaper. 

After 5 sec, if the target is below 35% health this effect will explode dealing an additional 661,834 Shadowfrost damage to the target. If the enemy that yields experience or honor dies while afflicted by Soul Reaper, gain Runic Corruption.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 3%. When suffering a loss of control effect, this bonus is increased by an additional 6% for 6 sec.
Increases Lichborne duration by 2 sec and while active damage taken is reduced by 15%.
Anti-Magic Shell increases healing received by 15%.
Your auto-attacks reduce the target's auto-attack speed by 5% for 30 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

When you fall below 30% health you drain 321,403 health from nearby enemies, the damage you take is reduced by 10% and your Death Strike cost is reduced by 10 for 8 sec.

Can only occur every 2 min.
Consuming a Rune has a chance to increase your Strength by 6% for 8 sec.
When you pull an enemy, the damage they deal to you is reduced by 6% for 6 sec.
Damage taken below 30% Health is reduced by 35%.
Magic damage taken is reduced by 8% and the duration of harmful Magic effects against you are reduced by 35%.

Sprout an additional limb, dealing 1 million Shadow damage over 12 sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Every 1 sec, an enemy is pulled to your location if they are further than 8 yds from you. The same enemy can only be pulled once every 4 sec.
Death's Advance, Death and Decay, and Death Grip have 1 additional charge.
Instantly strike the target and 1 other nearby enemy, causing 197,114 Physical damage, and reducing enemies' movement speed by 20% for 8 sec, plus 2 Runic Power per additional enemy struck.

Smash the target, dealing 171,825 Physical damage and generating 3 charges of Bone Shield.

 Bone Shield
Surrounds you with a barrier of whirling bones, increasing Armor by 78,410. Each melee attack against you consumes a charge. Lasts 30 sec or until all charges are consumed.

Deals 192,846 Shadow damage and infects all enemies within 10 yds with Blood Plague.

 Blood Plague
A shadowy disease that drains 281,318 health from the target over 12 sec.
Embrace your undeath, increasing your maximum health by 30% and increasing all healing and absorbs received by 30% for 10 sec.

When you would pull an enemy generate 1 charge of Bone Shield.

 Bone Shield
Surrounds you with a barrier of whirling bones, increasing Armor by 78,410. Each melee attack against you consumes a charge. Lasts 30 sec or until all charges are consumed.

While you have at least 5 Bone Shield charges, the cost of Death Strike is reduced by 5 Runic Power.

Additionally, your maximum Runic Power is increased by 10.
Heart Strike damage increased by 30%.
When you lose a Bone Shield charge the damage of your next Marrowrend is increased by 15%, stacking up to 75%.
Heart Strike generates 2 additional Runic Power per target hit.

Summons a rune weapon for 14 sec that mirrors your melee attacks and bolsters your defenses.

While active, you gain 35% parry chance.
Each enemy hit by Blood Boil increases the damage and healing done by your next Death Strike by 8%, stacking up to 5 times.
When Crimson Scourge is consumed, you gain 6% Versatility for 6 sec.
Bone Shield increases your Haste by 10%.
Dancing Rune Weapon generates 5 Bone Shield charges. When a charge of Bone Shield is consumed, the cooldown of Dancing Rune Weapon is reduced by 5 sec.

Your Blood Plague and Death and Decay deal damage 15% more often.

Additionally, your Blood Plague leeches 50% more Health.
Increases Armor gained from Bone Shield by 10% and it can stack 2 additional times.
Summons 1 additional copy of Dancing Rune Weapon and increases its duration by 6 sec.
Death Strike's healing is increased by 15% and grants you 12% Leech for 8 sec.
Enemies affected by Blood Plague take 5% increased damage from you and Death Strike increases the damage of your Blood Plague by 25% for 12 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Consume up to 5 Bone Shield charges. For each charge consumed, you gain 6 Runic Power and absorb damage equal to 6% of your maximum health for 8 sec.

Strikes all enemies in front of you with a hungering attack that deals 210,583 Physical damage and heals you for 150% of that damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Causes your Blood Plague damage to occur 30% more quickly for 6 sec. 

Generates 2 Runes.
You deal 6% more damage and receive 5% more healing while standing in your Death and Decay.
When Bone Shield is consumed it shatters dealing 9,567 Shadow damage to nearby enemies. This damage is tripled while you are within your Death and Decay.
Heart Strike has a chance to increase the damage of your next Death Strike by 20%.
Blood Shield's duration is increased by 2 sec and it absorbs 20% more damage.
Reduces the cooldown on Vampiric Blood by 2.0 sec per 10 Runic Power spent.

Consume up to 5 Bone Shield charges to create a whirl of bone and gore that batters all nearby enemies, dealing 74,769 Shadow damage every 1 sec, and healing you for 2% of your maximum health every time it deals damage (up to 10%). Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Lasts 2 sec per Bone Shield charge spent and rapidly regenerates a Bone Shield every 1 sec.

An unholy pact that prevents fatal damage, instead absorbing incoming healing equal to the damage prevented, lasting 3 sec.

If any healing absorption remains when this effect expires, you will die. This effect may only occur every 4 min.
While Blood Shield is active, you deal 25% increased Physical damage.

Viciously slice into the soul of your enemy, dealing 391,710 Shadowfrost damage and applying Reaper's Mark.

Each time you deal Shadow or Frost damage, add a stack of Reaper's Mark. After 12 sec or reaching 40 stacks, the mark explodes, dealing 36,231 damage per stack.

Reaper's Mark travels to an unmarked enemy nearby if the target dies, or explodes below 35% health when there are no enemies to travel to. This explosion cannot occur again on a target for 3 min.

Reaper's Mark sends forth bursts of Shadowfrost energy and back, dealing 227,985 Shadowfrost damage both ways to all enemies caught in its path.

Wave of Souls critical strikes cause enemies to take 5% increased Shadowfrost damage for 15 sec, stacking up to 2 times, and it is always a critical strike on its way back.
Blood Plague deals its damage 100% faster, and the second scythe of Exterminate applies Blood Plague.

Blood Boil deals 10% increased damage, and is now Shadowfrost.

Shadowfrost damage applies 2 stacks to Reaper's Mark and 4 stacks when it is a critical strike.
When Reaper's Mark explodes, it deals 10% of the damage dealt to nearby enemies and causes them to deal 5% reduced Physical damage to you for 10 sec.

When you apply Reaper's Mark, the cooldown of Soul Reaper is reset, your next Soul Reaper costs no runes, and it explodes on the target regardless of their health.

Soul Reaper damage is increased by 20%.
Each Rune spent reduces the magic damage you take by 1.5% and each Rune generated reduces the physical damage you take by 1.5% for 5 sec, up to 5 times.

If no enemies are struck by Soul Rupture, you gain 10% Strength for 8 sec.

Wave of Souls is 100% more effective on the main target of your Reaper's Mark.
Reduces the cooldown of Reaper's Mark by 15 sec, but the amount of Marrowrends empowered by Exterminate is reduced by 1.
Reduces the cooldowns of Lichborne and Raise Dead by 30 sec.

After Reaper's Mark explodes, your next 1 Marrowrend cost 1 Rune and summon 2 scythes to strike your enemies.

The first scythe strikes your target for 917,482 Shadowfrost damage and has a 30% chance to apply Reaper's Mark, the second scythe strikes all enemies around your target for 503,905 Shadowfrost damage and applies Blood Plague. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Focuses dark power into a strike that deals 358,484 Physical damage and heals you for 30.19% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 8.5% of maximum health.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side.  You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time. Lasts 1 min.
Auto attacks have a chance to generate 3 Runic Power.
Death Strike's cost is reduced by 5, and its healing is increased by 5%.

Heart Strike hits up to 3 additional enemies while you remain in Death and Decay. 

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.
Smash the target's mind with cold, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.

When Blinding Sleet ends, enemies are slowed by 50% for 6 sec.

Damage taken below 30% Health is reduced by 35%.

Increases the effectiveness of your Runeforge effects by 20%.
Absorbs are 15% more effective on you.
Lifts the enemy target off the ground, crushing their throat with dark energy and stunning them for 5 sec.

Strike an enemy for 144,502 Shadowfrost damage and afflict the enemy with Soul Reaper. 

After 5 sec, if the target is below 35% health this effect will explode dealing an additional 661,834 Shadowfrost damage to the target. If the enemy that yields experience or honor dies while afflicted by Soul Reaper, gain Runic Corruption.

When you fall below 30% health you drain 321,403 health from nearby enemies, the damage you take is reduced by 10% and your Death Strike cost is reduced by 10 for 8 sec.

Can only occur every 2 min.
Consuming a Rune has a chance to increase your Strength by 6% for 8 sec.
When you pull an enemy, the damage they deal to you is reduced by 6% for 6 sec.
Damage taken below 30% Health is reduced by 35%.
Magic damage taken is reduced by 8% and the duration of harmful Magic effects against you are reduced by 35%.

Sprout an additional limb, dealing 968,885 Shadow damage over 12 sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Every 1 sec, an enemy is pulled to your location if they are further than 8 yds from you. The same enemy can only be pulled once every 4 sec.
Death's Advance, Death and Decay, and Death Grip have 1 additional charge.

Strikes for 376,078 Physical damage and infects the target with 2-3 Festering Wounds.

 Festering Wound
A pustulent lesion that will burst on death or when damaged by Scourge Strike, dealing 62,784 Shadow damage and generating 3 Runic Power.
An unholy strike that deals 197,101 Physical damage and 108,544 Shadow damage, and causes 1 Festering Wound to burst.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side. You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time.

Your auto attacks have a 25% chance to make your next Death Coil cost 10 less Runic Power and critically strike. 

Additionally, your next Death Coil will burst 1 Festering Wound.

Your ghoul deals 120,132 Shadow damage to 5 nearby enemies and transforms into a powerful undead monstrosity for 15 sec. The ghoul's abilities are empowered and take on new functions while the transformation is active.
Your diseases deal 10% more damage and have a 5% increased chance to critically strike.
Festering Strike and Festering Wound damage increased by 20%.
Death Coil and Epidemic increase the duration of Dark Transformation by 1 sec.

Defile the targeted ground, dealing 762,535 Shadow damage to all enemies over 10 sec.

While you remain within your Defile, your Scourge Strike will hit 7 enemies near the target.

Every sec, if any enemies are standing in the Defile, it grows in size and deals increased damage.

Dark Transformation surrounds your ghoul with a vile swarm of insects for 6 sec, stinging all nearby enemies and infecting them with Virulent Plague and an unholy disease that deals 85,193 damage over 14 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

Bring doom upon the enemy, dealing 132,624 Shadow damage and bursting up to 4 Festering Wounds on the target.

Summons 4 Army of the Dead ghouls for 20 sec.

Generates 2 Runes.
Scourge Strike causes your disease damage to occur 100% more quickly for 10 sec.
Diseases deal 12% more damage over time in half the duration.
Bursting a Festering Wound deals 16% more damage, and deals 44,555 Shadow damage to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Apocalypse and Army of the Dead also summon a Magus of the Dead who hurls Frostbolts and Shadow Bolts at your foes.
Inflict disease upon your enemies spreading Festering Wounds equal to the amount currently active on your target to 7 nearby enemies.
Your ghoul's Claw attack has a 30% chance to cause a Festering Wound on the target.
Your Magus of the Dead Shadow Bolt now fires a volley of Shadow Bolts at up to 4 nearby enemies.
Death Coil causes the target to take an additional 30% of the direct damage dealt over 4 sec.

Death Coil and Epidemic debilitate your enemy applying Death Rot causing them to take 1% increased Shadow damage, up to 10% from you for 10 sec. If Death Coil or Epidemic consume Sudden Doom it applies two stacks of Death Rot.
Summons a legion of ghouls who swarms your enemies, fighting anything they can for 30 sec.
Consuming Sudden Doom calls upon a Magus of the Dead to assist you for 6 sec.
Diseased enemies take 2% increased damage from you per disease they are affected by.
Popping a Festering Wound increases your Strength by 2% for 20 sec stacking. Multiple instances may overlap.
Raises an Abomination for 30 sec which wanders and attacks enemies, applying Festering Wound when it melees targets, and affecting all those nearby with Virulent Plague.
Your Virulent Plague also applies Frost Fever and Blood Plague at 75% effectiveness.
Strike your target dealing 341,759 Shadow damage, infecting the target with 4 Festering Wounds and sending you into an Unholy Frenzy increasing all damage done by 20% for 20 sec.

Call upon your Death Charger to break free of movement impairment effects.

For 10 sec, while upon your Death Charger your movement speed is increased by 100%, you cannot be slowed below 100% of normal speed, and you are immune to forced movement effects and knockbacks.
Your damage is increased by 5% and you gain the benefits of your Death and Decay while inside Mograine's Death and Decay.
When you take damage, 5% of the damage is redirected to each active horsemen.
When Scourge Strike damages an enemy affected by Undeath it gains 1 stack and infects another nearby enemy.

If an enemy dies while Nazgrim is active, the strength of Apocalyptic Conquest is increased by 3%.

Additionally, each Rune you spend increase its value by 1%.
Scourge Strike shatters Trollbane's Chains of Ice when hit, dealing 376,042 Shadowfrost damage to nearby enemies, and slowing them by 40% for 4 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
The damage of your diseases and Death Coil are increased by 10%.
While you have 2 or more Horsemen aiding you, your Runic Power spending abilities deal 20% increased damage.
Scourge Strike deals 15% increased damage and the cooldown of your Death and Decay is reduced by 10 sec.
Army of the Dead and Frostwyrm's Fury call upon all 4 Horsemen to aid you for 20 sec.
Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Focuses dark power into a strike that deals 357,105 Physical damage and heals you for 30.19% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 8.5% of maximum health.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side.  You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time. Lasts 1 min.

Heart Strike hits up to 3 additional enemies while you remain in Death and Decay. 

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.
Your ghoul's attacks have a chance to apply Enfeeble, reducing the enemies movement speed by 30% and the damage they deal to you by 12% for 6 sec.
Your diseases have a chance to weaken your enemy causing your attacks against them to deal 6% increased damage for 5 sec.

Strikes for 369,851 Physical damage and infects the target with 2-3 Festering Wounds.

 Festering Wound

Raises a ghoul to fight by your side. You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time.

Additionally, your next Death Coil will burst 1 Festering Wound.

Your diseases deal 10% more damage and have a 5% increased chance to critically strike.
Festering Strike and Festering Wound damage increased by 20%.

Bring doom upon the enemy, dealing 134,804 Shadow damage and bursting up to 4 Festering Wounds on the target.

Summons 4 Army of the Dead ghouls for 20 sec.

Generates 2 Runes.
Scourge Strike causes your disease damage to occur 100% more quickly for 10 sec.
Your Soul Reaper, Scourge Strike, Festering Strike, and Death Coil deal 30% additional damage to enemies below 35% health.
Diseases deal 12% more damage over time in half the duration.
Dark Transformation also increases the attack speed and damage of you and your Monstrosity by 5%.
Apocalypse and Army of the Dead also summon a Magus of the Dead who hurls Frostbolts and Shadow Bolts at your foes.
Dark Transformation creates an unholy pact between you and your pet, igniting flaming chains that deal 601,125 Shadow damage over 15 sec to enemies between you and your pet.
Your ghoul's Claw attack has a 30% chance to cause a Festering Wound on the target.
Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.

Death Strike's cost is reduced by 5, and its healing is increased by 5%.

Heart Strike hits up to 3 additional enemies while you remain in Death and Decay. 

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.

Stamina increased by 20%.
Your diseases have a chance to weaken your enemy causing your attacks against them to deal 6% increased damage for 5 sec.
Your Runic Power spending abilities increase your melee attack speed by 6% for 10 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Places an Anti-Magic Zone that reduces spell damage taken by party or raid members by 20%. The Anti-Magic Zone lasts for 8 sec or until it absorbs 25.1 million damage.
Increases the effectiveness of your Runeforge effects by 20%.
Absorbs are 15% more effective on you.

Strike an enemy for 143,965 Shadowfrost damage and afflict the enemy with Soul Reaper. 

After 5 sec, if the target is below 35% health this effect will explode dealing an additional 661,834 Shadowfrost damage to the target. If the enemy that yields experience or honor dies while afflicted by Soul Reaper, gain Runic Corruption.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 3%. When suffering a loss of control effect, this bonus is increased by an additional 6% for 6 sec.
Increases Lichborne duration by 2 sec and while active damage taken is reduced by 15%.
Anti-Magic Shell increases healing received by 15%.
Your auto-attacks reduce the target's auto-attack speed by 5% for 30 sec, stacking up to 4 times.
Your chance to be critically struck is reduced by 3% and your Armor is increased by 6%.

When you fall below 30% health you drain 321,403 health from nearby enemies, the damage you take is reduced by 10% and your Death Strike cost is reduced by 10 for 8 sec.

Can only occur every 2 min.
When you pull an enemy, the damage they deal to you is reduced by 6% for 6 sec.
Damage taken below 30% Health is reduced by 35%.
Anti-Magic shell now removes all harmful magical effects when activated, but it's cooldown is increased by 20  sec.

Sprout an additional limb, dealing 987,688 Shadow damage over 12 sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Every 1 sec, an enemy is pulled to your location if they are further than 8 yds from you. The same enemy can only be pulled once every 4 sec.

Strikes for 370,221 Physical damage and infects the target with 2-3 Festering Wounds.

 Festering Wound
A pustulent lesion that will burst on death or when damaged by Scourge Strike, dealing 64,220 Shadow damage and generating 3 Runic Power.
An unholy strike that deals 198,912 Physical damage and 110,343 Shadow damage, and causes 1 Festering Wound to burst.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side. You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time.

Your auto attacks have a 25% chance to make your next Death Coil cost 10 less Runic Power and critically strike. 

Additionally, your next Death Coil will burst 1 Festering Wound.

Your ghoul deals 118,122 Shadow damage to 5 nearby enemies and transforms into a powerful undead monstrosity for 15 sec. The ghoul's abilities are empowered and take on new functions while the transformation is active.
Your diseases deal 10% more damage and have a 5% increased chance to critically strike.
Festering Strike and Festering Wound damage increased by 20%.
Death Coil and Epidemic increase the duration of Dark Transformation by 1 sec.

Defile the targeted ground, dealing 770,992 Shadow damage to all enemies over 10 sec.

While you remain within your Defile, your Scourge Strike will hit 7 enemies near the target.

Every sec, if any enemies are standing in the Defile, it grows in size and deals increased damage.

Dark Transformation surrounds your ghoul with a vile swarm of insects for 6 sec, stinging all nearby enemies and infecting them with Virulent Plague and an unholy disease that deals 85,193 damage over 14 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

Bring doom upon the enemy, dealing 134,676 Shadow damage and bursting up to 4 Festering Wounds on the target.

Summons 4 Army of the Dead ghouls for 20 sec.

Generates 2 Runes.

Your Soul Reaper, Scourge Strike, Festering Strike, and Death Coil deal 30% additional damage to enemies below 35% health.
Diseases deal 12% more damage over time in half the duration.

Dark Transformation also increases the attack speed and damage of you and your Monstrosity by 5%.
Apocalypse and Army of the Dead also summon a Magus of the Dead who hurls Frostbolts and Shadow Bolts at your foes.

Your ghoul's Claw attack has a 30% chance to cause a Festering Wound on the target.
